stable_lessons.title: Verbose Implementation Standard
stable_lessons.summary: All code and documentation must include rationale-rich commentary and explicit edge-case considerations.

stable_lessons.title: Session Logging Discipline
stable_lessons.summary: Every working session must produce a log in logs/session_<date>.md capturing objectives, context, and follow-up prompts.

stable_lessons.title: Runtime Optional Dependency Checks
stable_lessons.summary: Handle optional libraries by importing them normally and relying on runtime capability helpers to emit user-facing warnings when dependencies are missing.

procedures.name: Self-Prompt Kickoff
steps: Review Agent manual, memory entries, and logic inbox for context.
Draft a self-contained objective prompt and record it in the session log.
Outline validation strategy before modifying files.
